feed.title: Lightning, the death of BIP62, and Segregated Witness

entry.title: Lightning, the death of BIP62, and Segregated Witness
entry.summary: The upcoming event, Scaling Bitcoin HK, is going to feature a talk that has generated excitement among attendees. While no specific details about the talk have been provided, its inclusion on the program has sparked anticipation and curiosity. The conference, which focuses on issues related to scaling the bitcoin network, promises to be an informative and engaging event for all those involved in the cryptocurrency world. With numerous experts and thought leaders set to attend, this event is sure to provide valuable insights and perspectives on the challenges facing the bitcoin community. Overall, the talk at Scaling Bitcoin HK is just one of many highlights that attendees can look forward to experiencing.
